name: lunisolar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving both the moon and the sun: It is the motion of the solar system that causes precession, not lunisolar forces. Researchers are questioning the extent of lunisolar causation and have proposed an alternative solar system model. See also
lunisolar calendarCompare
lunar
solar
More examplesFewer examplesLunisolar effects are gravitational effects caused by the attraction of the moon and of the sun.This lunisolar theory of precession had become widely accepted.Ramos da Silva and Avissar (2005) showed that lunisolar tides have been unambiguously correlated with the Arctic oscillation since the 1960s.
